text: This is one of the most frequent Qs I’m asked: Should I get the #covid19 #vaccine if I’m pregnant or thinking of becoming pregnant? My answer, with @PamelaBrownCNN (@DimpleAjmera), on how to approach this decision. With some good news from a new study: https://t.co/VRYhHE5JbU https://t.co/oPTAeY1T0M
